title: Crazy Goth Asians with Mary H.K. Choi
description:
The Charts, ever heard of ‘em? Well, Throwing Fits is on top and once you get used to the view up here you can only relate to winners, which is exactly why this week we’re dialing in New York Times bestselling author Mary H.K. Choi to reflect on success. Mary is taking it all in including, but not limited to: life’s big wins and loses, being rich vs. being famous, her first book for grownups, going Hollywood, being sober for the apocalypse, trip(s) from hell, dressing to impress and much more on this young adult episode of The Only Podcast That Matters™.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
